wybug_title: 药房网某站多处数据库注射漏洞可导致信息泄露
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-13：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-01-23：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-02：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-12：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-02-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 药房网某站多处数据库信息泄露 详细说明：  1、
url：http://m.yaofang.cn/cart/cityListpost:province_id=

A Database Error OccurredError Number: 1064You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '' at line 1SELECT region_id,region_name FROM ecs_region WHERE parent_id =Filename: /apache/htdocs/yfsite_wap/n/application/wap/models/usersmodel.phpLine Number: 193


2、
url:http://m.yaofang.cn//cart/delGoods post:goods_id=&r=0.6412887854967266

A Database Error OccurredError Number: 1064You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'and shop_id = 42000 and fromId = 0' at line 1delete from ecs_cart where session_id = 'm1421058848' and goods_id = and shop_id = 42000 and fromId = 0Filename: /apache/htdocs/yfsite_wap/n/application/wap/models/cart_model.phpLine Number: 64


3、get:http://m.yaofang.cn/cart/disList
A Database Error OccurredError Number: 1064You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '' at line 1SELECT region_id,region_name FROM ecs_region WHERE parent_id =Filename: /apache/htdocs/yfsite_wap/n/application/wap/models/usersmodel.phpLine Number: 193


4、
url:http://m.yaofang.cn//cart/updateCartGoodsNumberpost:flag=12345'"\'\");|]*{%0d%0a<%00>%bf%27'####&goods_id=1004458&r=0.01643573702313006

A Database Error OccurredError Number: 1064You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '1 WHERE `goods_id` = '1004458' AND `session_id` = ''' at line 1UPDATE ecs_cart SET goods_number = goods_number 1 WHERE `goods_id` = '1004458' AND `session_id` = ''Filename: /apache/htdocs/yfsite_wap/n/application/wap/models/cart_model.phpLine Number: 155


   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 BMa@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-01-13 14:45 厂商回复： 您提交的报告我们已收到！感谢您对药房网的关注和支持！经过我们技术评定后，会发放奖励，请保持手机畅通。 最新状态： 暂无
